page.title: 18Weymouth Pool/Sports Area.
page.content: { Along Knightsdale Road}is a large area of land where{sporting activities {take place. There is a Swimming Pool, {an Athletics track, football pitches and{changing rooms and St. Paul's {Harriers Club House. The{Swimming Pool has two pools.}The little learner pool is always lovely and warm, so older people and little children prefer it. Good swimmers prefer the big pool which is over two metres at the deep end.{Upstairs}there is a{Gym}which you have to pay to go on. If you are a{spectator it is 25p to watch. It is{45p for children}to go Swimming and{85p for adults. Both adults and children use the {football pitches. The Marsh}as it is known is the{training area}for{youth {teams}like the Weymouth Wizards. Pool account-Teresa Hoare.
